imdb.plot outline: Nothing puts fans on their feet more than a spectacular knockout, and with the Knockout of the Night series, you'll see the most explosive finishes 2012 has had to offer thanks to Edson Barboza, Anthony Pettis, Lavar Johnson, and more UFC heavy hitters.
imdb.title: Knockout of the Night
plot: _Knockout of the Night_ (qv) - Real fights vying for the award given to the fighter with the most impressive knockout/technical knockout.

Nothing puts fans on their feet more than a spectacular knockout, and with the _Knockout of the Night_ (qv) series, you'll see the most explosive finishes 2012 has had to offer thanks to Edson Barboza, Anthony Pettis, Lavar Johnson, and more UFC heavy hitters.

Whether it's a 14 second finish by Anthony Perosh, a knockout for the ages by Chris Weidman over Anderson Silva, or more fireworks from Roy Nelson, the _Knockout of the Night_ (qv) collection captures the most explosive moments in combat sports today.
